description:
This live-coding session will guide you through the process of migrating
an existing Flask application to AWS Lambda.

We will analyze the existing application, decompose it into individual
microservices, adapt authentication, frontend, tests, and data model,
and finally deploy it to the Cloud.

Throughout this step-by-step process, you will learn the benefits of
serverless and how it will change the way you think of scalability,
availability, security, infrastructure management, and cost
optimization.

**Feedback form:** https://python.it/feedback-1620

in \_\_on **Friday 3 May** at 10:30 `**See

title: Porting your Python web app to serverless in 30 minutes
